attributes.action: Close universities, reimburse tuition & accommodation fees, close county borders
attributes.additional_details: Disappointed in the way that the government has dealt with the start of the education term and by the way that they have put the lives of residents at risk
attributes.background: Listen to the public and address the issue of rising cases - by dealing with the increase in cases

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Require university campuses to close to stop the spread of COVID-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552512

Limit travel during lockdown by county or a mile radius: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/324044

Require universities to partially refund tuition fees for 20/21 due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/324762

Government subsidise this year's university tuition fees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552814

Refunding accommodation fees would be a matter for individual universities and providers of student accommodation, not the Government or House of Commons. You could start a petition calling on the Government to reimburse students for university accommodation they do not use during the Covid-19 outbreak.
